name: Push-Up High
description:
Then this is a game for you!

Push yourself to the limit in this brutal 3D platformer inspired by Getting Over It and Human: Fall Flat. The goal of the game is simple! Climb your way to the top, but be careful not to fall too far down.

Controls
  • Control the player by moving the mouse
  • Climb - Left click.
  • Third Person View - Right-click.
Hello!

Thank you for checking out our itch page. We hope you enjoy the demo of Push-Up High! We currently have two developers working on the game, so any feedback is greatly appreciated. Note, the game collects data regarding playtime to help us move forward in our development.

If you have any further questions do not hesitate to contact us on discord https://discord.gg/QnqwqEU7mK.   

      

             Additional notes
  • Supports all aspect ratios.
  • The game collects data regarding playtime.
  • Supports Windows OS.
  • Credit to US Army Blues, Daniel Veesey and BalanceBay for the music prod.
